bibl.title: Vizualizacija pozdnerimskoj kreposti. 2. Komp'juternaja rekonstrukcija hrama kul'ta rimskogo imperatora v pozdnerimskoj kreposti v Luksore (Egipet). [Imaging of the Late Roman Castrum. 2. Computer Reconstruction of the Roman Imperial Cult Temple in the Late Roman Fortress at Luxor in Egypt.]
bibl.note: The article is dedicated to the study of the architectural peculiarities of the late Roman Imperial cult temple at Luxor and to the creation of its 3D computer reconstruction. - Avec résumés en russe et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Dmitry Karelin, Vizualizacija pozdnerimskoj kreposti. 2. Komp'juternaja rekonstrukcija hrama kul'ta rimskogo imperatora v pozdnerimskoj kreposti v Luksore (Egipet). [Imaging of the Late Roman Castrum. 2. Computer Reconstruction of the Roman Imperial Cult Temple in the Late Roman Fortress at Luxor in Egypt.]
Architecture and Modern Information Technologies 26 (2014) 22 pp., 12 figg. n./bl. et coul.

The article is dedicated to the study of the architectural peculiarities of the late Roman Imperial cult temple at Luxor and to the creation of its 3D computer reconstruction. - Avec résumés en russe et en anglais.
